arts.ttl: PSG vs Angers – Luis Enrique’s press conference live at 1 p.m.
arts.sum: This Friday at 8:45 p.m. (CET), Paris Saint-Germain (2nd) will face Angers (7th) at the Parc des Princes during the second matchday of Ligue 1 2025-2026. On the eve of this match, Parisian coach Luis Enrique will be in a press conference at 1 p.m. An event to follow live here (we will then publish […]

arts.ttl: PSG vs Angers – Official medical update: 1 Parisian will be missing
arts.sum: This Friday, second-placed Paris Saint-Germain will face seventh-placed Angers at the Parc des Princes for Matchday 2 of Ligue 1 2025-2026 (kick-off at 8:45 p.m., CET). After Friday’s training session, on the eve of the match, the club provided an injury update. The medical update for Thursday 21st August concerns Senny Mayulu. Senny Mayulu continues […]

arts.ttl: Gianluigi Donnarumma still training with PSG ahead of Angers clash
arts.sum: Gianluigi Donnarumma was once again present at PSG training on Thursday morning, just a day before Luis Enrique’s side host Angers at the Parc des Princes in the second round…

arts.ttl: PSG vs Angers – The start of Parisian training live this Thursday.
arts.sum: This Thursday, Paris Saint-Germain (2nd) will be training at the PSG Campus at 11 a.m. to prepare for Friday evening’s match against Angers (7th) at the Parc des Princes on Matchday 1 of Matchday 2 of Ligue 1 2025-2026 (kick-off at 8:45 p.m., CET). The club is offering to follow the session live:
